body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam 3 inch Dashboard Camera Full HD 170° Wide Angle Backup Camera with Night Vision WDR G-Sensor Parking Monitor Loop Recording Motion Detection
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 35 mins
features: ★【Dash Cam Front and Rear】This dual dash cam equipped with 1080P resolution front camera and waterproof rear camera.The car dashcam with 6 pcs IR LED and Wide Dynamic Range, the front camera captures the license plates and road signs clearly even at night, thus ensuring to get you the best footage. Wide-angle front (170°) and rear（130°）camera help eliminate the blind spots of your vision.

★【Loop Recording & Emergency Accident Locks】Seamless loop recording overwrites the old footage with new content when the card is full. Variable sensitivity G-Sensor automatically detects a sudden collision and immediately saves the relevant footage and locks it to SOS file. Thus preventing any overwriting and thereby protecting your video evidence. Keep you away from driving disputes. This dashboard camera supports up to 32GB of micro SD card (NOTE: card NOT included in package).

★ 【Dash Cams with Parking Mode】The dash cams automatically powers on and starts recording as soon as impact is detected, thus providing you a video evidence if your car is scratched by someone in parking. Hence ensuring your peace of mind with complete 24x7 monitoring of your car.We suggest some important function settings for your daily using: G-Sensor level choose" low" , or turn off; loop recording choose “3 minutes”; motion detection choose "off" ; parking monitor choose "On".

★【Easy Installation & Use】This dash camera is very easy to install and operate with reference pictures in our user manual.Just insert SD card (not included) and connect to the power supply. The car dash camera will start recording immediately after igniting, shut down and save the video when you shut off the engine. Please download "User guide" in product page if you need more details of operation & installation instruction.

★【For ever after-sales support 】CHORTAU is a remarkable company and believes in driving innovations to add value to our customers. We offer for ever after sales suppor for this dual dash cam, 7*24 hours technical support. If you have any queries of this dashcam,please reach our customer service team .

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam is today’s most advanced and powerful Video Car Dash Camera featuring Warm Tips: 1.Micro SD card NOT included in package, you will need to prepare a 32GB, class 10 card.2.Please adjust the sensitivity of G-sensor to Low or turn it off if your monitor shows "card full" even with loop recording function open of this dash cam.3.The function of built in 150mAh battery is just for emergency recording and save settings. Please keep the dashcam plugged in always, the dual dash cam will shut down after 5 seconds when there is no external power connection.4.To ensure seamless video recording,please kindly turn off “motion detection” of this dash camera while driving.5.If you want screen off but dash cam still keep recording, just choose" screensaver" in setting, dashcam will keep recording as normal. Specification&Package : Screen : 3 inch LCD DisplayLens : 170° Wide Angle LensVideo format: AVIInternal Power: Built-in Li-ion BatteryExternal power supply : DC 5V/1.5A，power port: cigar lighter socket, (If your car do not have cigar lighter socket, you could install dash cam with hard wire kit)Operating temperature : -86°F～+158°FStorage : Micro SD Card 32GB (NOT included in the package, please prepare a 32GB card)Package :1 x CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam B-T13; 1 x Rear Camera; 1 x cigar lighter car charger power cord ; 1 x Adjustable mount; 1xMini USB cable; 1 x User Manual

Main features Dash Cam Front and Rear CHORTAU dual dash cam cover both front and rear angle for great protection and peace of mind on the road. Monitoring the roads ahead and behind the car simultaneously. The videos taken by the rear camera are stored alongside those from the front camera on the memory card for easy access. Super Night Vision With 6pcs LED, IR( infrared ) lights and super night vision technology, the dashboard camera will capture clear videos and image footage even in low-light night conditions. Reversing Camera Mode for Safe Parking This dash cameras display screen will automatically show full rear view with parking guide lines when the car reverse gear is engaged. The waterproof rear view camera will help you to park your car easily and safely.

Powerful Functions 24-Hours Parking Monitor This dual dash cam works on an internal battery. If you turn on park mode,when someone hits your car and impact reaches the G-Sensor, the dash camera will turn on and record a short video,then lock and save it,and turn off automatically.If you install dash cam with hard wire kit,this dashcam will monitoring your car 24x7 hours. The dashboard camera screen will show front and rear view at the same time,both front and rear cam will work in parking mode. G-sensor (Emergency Recording) The car dash cam with built-in adjustable G-Sensor, current footage will be locked and protected in the SD card when the G-Sensor is triggered by sudden shake collision, provide you significant evidence when something unexpected happens. Loop recording The dashcam with loop recording function, new recordings will automatically overwrite oldest recordings when the memory card is full. You can choose the size of each file as 1minutes, 3 minutes, 5 minutes.

Practical Functions 1080P Dash Camera Full HD 1080P @30fps dash cams present ultra-high quality and fluent video, this dash camera will provide you the best visual experience. Waterproof Rear Camera with Infrared LED Light This dual dash cam comes with a waterproof rear camera, which has 4 LED lights, allow you to see and film what is happening behind your car even at night. And because it is waterproof, no need to worry if it is raining. Why Dash Cam saying SD Card full? / Dash Cam turn off ramdomly? When the dash cam saying " SD card FULL", the dash camera will turn off ramdomly, which is to remind you formart card and need reset the dashcams. Just follow below steps could solve this issue, 1. Turn off G sensor, 2. Turn off motion detection, 3. Turn off Parking mode, 4. Format SD card on dash cam,

Easy Installation This dashcam designed with 3 inch compact size will not block your sight and safer option whilst driving. Very easy to install and operate. Warm tips: This dual dash cam is not wireless, it need install with package included cigar lighter power cord. How to install the dual dash cam rear camera ? Situation 1:If your car do NOT have built in reversing system display monitor,and you need dash cam reverse assistance function, you will need connect the rear cam cable RED wire to car reversing lamp positive lead (12-24V).When you reverse car,the dash cam will show full screen of rear view with assistant line automatically. Situation 2:If your car already have built in reversing system display monitor, then no need connect the rear cam RED wire to anywhere, just ignore it. Please get in touch with our after-sales team, in case you need any more rear view camera installation support. Longer cable for rear cam The default rear view camera cable length is 16 feet which is suitable for most small cars. If your vehicle is a Van or a pickup truck, please search "B07YZ4X27T" on amazon to buy it directly. Original 16ft rear cam cable: fit small car (car total length not over 15ft).Original 16ft rear cam cable + 10ft extension cable=26ft: fit car/pickup truck/minivan (vehicles total length between 16ft ~ 25ft). What you got in the dash cam packing box? 1 x CHORTAU dual dash cam B-T13; 2 x Adjustable suction mount; 1 x Mini USB data Cable; 1 x Pin (use to insert/remove the micro SD card). 1 x Cigar lighter car charger power cord, (If your car DO NOT have cigar lighter socket, you could buy hard wire kit to install dash cam as a power cord) dash cam dash cams dashcam dash camera for cars

How to insert a micro SD card? Choose correct side of the card,Insert the card to dash cam card slot,Use the package included pin to poke the card deeply till the card clicks and stay in the card slot.Card inserted successfully. Please turn off dash cam when insert card, after card inserted then turn on the dash cam and format card directly on dash cam. Micro SD card is not included in package Micro SD card NOT included in package, please kindly prepare a card before use.This dash cameras support micro SD card max up to 32GB storage capacity (card NOT included in package ). Recommended to use Class 10, 16GB or 32GB Micro SD card. Do NOT support 64GB, 128GB, 256GB micro SD card. Dash camera saying “please insert a C6 card” after inserted a card, why? Answer: there are 2 reason will result this problem, 1): the card is low speed or low quality card, change a high speed class 10 (or higher) high quality card is OK. 2): Insert card before power on dash cam, if dash cam could not recognize card, just turn off camera and insert card, then turn on dash camera is OK. Why my dash cam always auto turn on and off? Answer: This dash cam has parking monitor function, if you turn the parking mode on, the dash cam will auto turn on and starts a 30s emergency recording and then turn off when the internal G sensor detects a shake. To solve this issue, we suggest you turn off the parking mode when driving and turn it on while you parked car. Then the parking monitor will help you protect your car after your car parked.

Front dash cam B-T12 Dash cam front and inside Dash cam front and rear B-T12F Hard wire kit Car Charger Camera Type Single front camera Front + inside Dash cam front and rear B-T12F For Dash cam installation Car Charger For Dash Camera Display Type 3 inch LCD 2.45 inch LCD 3 inch LCD Video/Image Resolution 1080P FHD 1080P FHD 1080P FHD Power interface DC 5V/1.5A~2A DC 5V/1.5A~2A DC 5V/1.5A~2A DC 12V-24V DC 12V-24V Microphone & Speaker ✓ ✓ Recommended Micro SD Card 16GB~32GB, Class 10 16GB~32GB, Class 10 Lens angle 170° 170°+140° Voice record ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have for Every Road Trip!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Front and Rear CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam 3 inch for my car, and I must say, it has completely exceeded my expectations. This dual dash cam has become an indispensable companion for all my road trips. Here's why I think it's an outstanding product:1. Crystal Clear Recording: The video quality of both the front and rear cameras is remarkable. The 1080p resolution captures every detail with impressive clarity. Even during low-light conditions, the night vision mode ensures that the footage remains clear and usable.2. Wide Viewing Angle: The wide-angle lenses provide an extensive view of the road ahead and behind, reducing blind spots and ensuring that all critical moments are captured. It's especially useful for capturing scenic routes or potential incidents on the road.3. Seamless Loop Recording: The loop recording feature ensures that I never run out of storage space. The oldest recordings are automatically overwritten, eliminating the hassle of manually managing the memory card.4. G-Sensor for Incident Detection: The built-in G-sensor has proven to be a lifesaver. It automatically detects sudden movements or impacts and locks the footage, preventing it from being overwritten. This feature provides invaluable evidence in case of accidents.5. User-Friendly Interface: The 3-inch display is the perfect size for quickly reviewing footage or adjusting settings. Navigating through the menus and playback is intuitive, even for someone who's not tech-savvy.6. Easy Installation: Setting up the CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam was a breeze. The included suction cup mount securely holds the cameras in place, and the provided cables are of good quality. I had it up and running within minutes.7. Parking Mode: The parking mode is a game-changer for those concerned about their car's safety while parked. The dash cam switches to standby mode but activates and records whenever it detects motion nearby. This adds an extra layer of security to my vehicle.8. Value for Money: Considering the features and performance, the CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam offers exceptional value for its price. It's a cost-effective way to enhance safety and accountability while driving.In conclusion, the Front and Rear CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam 3 inch has proven itself as a reliable and feature-packed dash cam system. Its impressive video quality, user-friendly interface, and useful features like loop recording, G-sensor, and parking mode make it an essential addition to any vehicle. Whether you're a frequent road tripper or just looking to enhance your driving safety, this dash cam is a wise investment that I wholeheartedly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Double the Protection with CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam, and I'm extremely satisfied with its performance and features. Here's an honest and comprehensive review of this impressive dashboard camera:High-Quality Video: The Full HD 1080p resolution provides crisp and clear video footage, both for the front and rear cameras. The 170° wide-angle lens captures a broad field of view, ensuring that you capture all the necessary details in your recordings.Dual-Camera Setup: Having both front and rear cameras is a game-changer for comprehensive protection on the road. You get the peace of mind of recording what's happening both in front of and behind your vehicle, which is crucial for accidents and incidents involving multiple angles.Seamless Loop Recording: The loop recording feature ensures that your camera never stops recording due to full storage. When the memory card is full, it automatically overwrites the oldest footage, keeping your dash cam continuously operational.G-Sensor for Incident Detection: The built-in G-sensor automatically detects and locks the video footage when it senses sudden movements or impacts, ensuring that crucial evidence is saved and protected in the event of an accident or collision.Wide Dynamic Range (WDR): This feature optimizes video quality in various lighting conditions. Whether you're driving during the day or at night, the CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam delivers consistent and high-quality footage.Parking Mode: The parking mode function activates the camera when your vehicle is parked and detects any motion or impact. This is a fantastic security feature to safeguard your vehicle while it's unattended.Easy Installation: Setting up this dash cam is a breeze. The 3-inch screen provides a clear view of your recordings and allows for easy navigation through the menu and settings.Sturdy Build: The CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam feels durable and well-constructed, ensuring its longevity and performance even in extreme weather conditions.Value for Money: Given its dual-camera setup, features, and video quality, this dash cam offers excellent value for its price range.In summary, the CHORTAU Dual Dash Cam is an excellent investment for your safety and peace of mind on the road. It combines high-quality video recording, dual-camera capabilities, and a range of features that make it an outstanding choice. Whether you're a daily commuter, a road trip enthusiast, or simply concerned about your safety, this dash cam will not disappoint. I highly recommend it for anyone in need of a reliable and feature-packed dashboard camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: El vendedor si cumplió y el retraso en la entrega fué culpa de las empresas de paquetería
reviews.reviewText: La cámara funciona muy bien la instale sin dificultades

Scrivo questa recensione a distanza di vari mesi dall'acquisto, un modo da aver avuto il tempo di testarla per bene: mi sono trovato benissimo! È piccola e si attacca al vetro tramite una ventosa molto forte e resistente. Le immagini sono chiare e si vedono perfettamente anche al buio (con gli infrarossi si vede molto bene). Salva i video su una scheda sd e li sovrascrive ai più vecchi in automatico. Solo la telecamera posteriore è stata più complessa da installare (lo ha fatto un elettrauto perchè da solo non ci sarei mai riuscito). È comunque un ottimo prodotto ad un buon prezzo 🔝🔝🔝

Despues de probar 4 cámaras de distinta marca, algunas de mayor precio que ésta opté por comprar esta marca y el caso es que es superior en todo a las que probe antes.... funciona perfectamente bién.... para lo que más la uso es para detectar movimiento y va genial.... las otras funciones también van muy bién ...la calidad de la imagen es superior... en una palabra completamente satisfecho con la compra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR, I would happily recommend this dash cam!!I've been using it for just over a year now and I'm still very happy with it. The power cord did stop working about a month ago, but I contacted the sellers and they were incredibly responsive and willing to help. I received a brand new power cord within a couple of weeks - tracked & free of charge. Amazing customer service; I would recommend this product for this experience alone.As far as the camera itself goes, I'd say it's good value for money. It was pretty easy to set up; I have it so the rear camera is inside my car taped to the top of the rear windscreen (I couldn't connect it to my brake lights like this, so I can't use the parking function...but I don't really care about that since I can use the rear camera to look behind me anyway). The mount for the camera has only fallen from my front windscreen once in my entire time using it, plus I don't find it to block my vision while driving. Additionally, the wires are plenty long enough to allow you to run them along the sides of your car and have them not be stretched out or in the way (for reference, I have a Peugeot 206 and I still had several arm lengths of wire left after setting up the rear camera).The menu is fairly simple to navigate. The video and audio quality isn't particularly great, but it does the job just fine. I do find that, at night, bright headlights close behind me completely whites out the image, but I'll take that over having the camera outside the car as intended. The image is fine if cars are the correct distance away from you and the glass is clean. I have the recording set to loop every 2 minutes and I found that, with a 32GB micro SD card (which doesn't come with the camera), I can store roughly and hour and a half's worth of clips at once. I now have a hilarious/scarily large collection of clips showing the bad drivers I've come across while recording that I can laugh/cringe at. Having a dash cam brought my car insurance down a little as well. Would 100% recommend.
